about_the_game:
Welcome, pilot! Are you ready for your first combat mission in "Enemy on the Tail!"? This game is your chance to become a true ace of aerial battles. Buckle up and listen closely!

In "Enemy on the Tail!" you'll be piloting various aircraft, each with unique characteristics. Your task is to leverage the strengths of your plane to get behind your opponent and attack. But remember, your enemy is also on high alert and will do everything to throw you off course!

Gameplay:
*Each player moves simultaneously with their opponent, playing a movement card for their aircraft.
*Then, the planes move across the field.
*If your plane ends up behind the enemy and your movement card included an attack, you strike your opponent.
*Special movement cards allow for deceptive maneuvers.

Game Modes:
Single Player Mode: Train against a smart AI that predicts your actions and challenges you at every turn.
Multiplayer: Test your skills in duels against pilots from around the world. Prove you’re the best!


*Diverse Aircraft: Pilot various planes with unique characteristics such as speed, damage, and maneuverability.
*Short matches of 2 minutes. Become the king of the sky by achieving a series of victories!
*Tactical Maneuvers: Use cunning maneuvers and strategies to deceive your opponent and take an advantageous position for attack.
*Mindgames: Anticipate your opponent’s actions based on their aircraft’s capabilities and their thought process.

"Enemy on the Tail!" isn’t just a game; it’s a true test of your tactical skills and ability to predict your opponent’s moves. Every battle is a new story, full of tension and unexpected twists. Are you ready to become an ace of aerial combat? Ready for takeoff!

​

name: Enemy on the tail!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel/AMD 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 4800
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9XX or AMD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: “Enemy on the Tail!” is a turn-based tactical dueling game about aerial combat. Choose your plane, use its unique traits, anticipate enemy moves, and attack! Or shake off enemies with clever maneuvers! Train against AI and compete with friends online. Ready for takeoff?
